text: Hi <@UAYBXDG4U> I’ll tell you more in DM

Hi!
When defining an ImageField component repeater this throws a TS error `Property 'src'is missing ...` .  Looked through the typing of the module but can't figure out what the issue is. Compiles without errors, and works fine in HS but would like to fix the type error.

Field:
```      <ImageField
        name="images"
        label="Images"
        resizable={false}
        occurrence={{ min: 3, default: 3 }}
        default={[defaultImage, defaultImage, defaultImage]}
      />```
Default value:
```const defaultImage = {
  src: ImageDefault,
  alt: 'Placeholder image',
  size_type: 'exact',
  loading: 'lazy',
  width: 1024,
  height: 588,
};```
